wiki.name: Resources to Support Student Use of OER
wiki.intro:
Several resources for this course have been developed to orient you to OER and to help you integrate them into science instruction.  In this wiki, list the resources and supports your students will need to understand and work with the OER you've selected for your lesson. In Module 6 when you complete your draft lesson plan, you’ll learn more about resources that can help students with using OER.

Click the EDIT tab to contribute to this wiki.
